resource.description: An AWS Support App resource that creates, updates, lists, and deletes Slack workspace configurations.

properties.name: TeamId
properties.description: The team ID in Slack, which uniquely identifies a workspace.

type.description: The team ID in Slack, which uniquely identifies a workspace.

properties.name: VersionId
properties.description: An identifier used to update an existing Slack workspace configuration in AWS CloudFormation.

type.description: An identifier used to update an existing Slack workspace configuration in AWS CloudFormation.
